# Practica 8
Cargar la base de datos Earquality y graficar con geom_line las temperaturas



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data("airquality")
```



```{r }

ggplot(data = airquality,aes(x = Day, y= Temp)) + geom_line(alpha = 0.4, color= "blue")

```
